data.title: The Ironmaster (1948 film)
data.meta_description: The Ironmaster is a 1948 French drama film directed by Fernand Rivers and starring Hélène Perdrière, Jean Chevrier and Jeanne Provost.
data.text:
The Ironmaster (French: Le maître de forges) is a 1948 French drama film directed by Fernand Rivers and starring Hélène Perdrière, Jean Chevrier and Jeanne Provost.[1]

The film's sets were designed by the art directors Robert Giordani and René Renoux.
